# mockbuster

> Python project: mockbuster

## Documentation

- [Installation](docs/index.md#installation): Install mockbuster using pip or uv
- [Usage](docs/index.md#usage): Learn how to use mockbuster as a library or CLI tool
- [Development](docs/index.md#development): Set up a development environment and run tests

## Project Information

- **Source Code**: https://github.com/benomahony/mockbuster
- **PyPI Package**: https://pypi.org/project/mockbuster
- **Documentation**: https://benomahony.github.io/mockbuster

## AI Integration

- **MCP Server**: Model Context Protocol server available at `src/mockbuster/mcp_server.py` for AI-powered documentation access
- **Agent Skill**: Claude Code skill available in `.skills/mockbuster/SKILL.md` for enhanced project interaction
